name: Frogger's Adventures: The Rescue
description:
Frogger's Adventures: The Rescue is an arcade game developed by Konami Digital Entertainment, Konami Computer Entertainment Hawaii and Konami Digital Entertainment America. It came out on 21-10-2003. Konami published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Frogger's Adventures: The Rescue is available on GameCube, PlayStation 2 and PC.
